title: The Fox Went Out on a Chilly Night
creator_credit: Cynthia Freitag, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Based on the children’s story of the same title by Peter Spier the words are sung twice by Molly Scott, first with only the pictures, then with the displayed words.
